text:
DefaultRecordFactory doesn't seem to want to create EscherTextboxRecord for
records of type 0xF00D, because they're flagged as being containers (but they
contain records in the parent application's format, not escher format)

The attached patch causes DefaultRecordFactory to create a EscherTextboxRecord
despite the container flag for records of type 0xF00D
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
